title: HOUR 1 - Kyrie Irving, Warriors, Deshaun Watson
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - Kyrie Irving, Warriors, Deshaun Watson
description:
Joy Taylor in for Colin

 

Kyrie Irving has been telling people who is for a while. He's not going to change.

Can this version of the Warriors win multiple titles?

Deshaun Watson's disciplinary hearing and his upcoming punishment.


Guest: Eddie House

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
